GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v5.4.231
GSD.description:
EDAC/qcom: Do not pass llcc_driv_data as edac_device_ctl_info's pvt_info

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.231 by commit 66e10d5f399629ef7877304d9ba2b35d0474e7eb, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit 27450653f1db0b9d5b5048a246c850c52ee4aa61. For more details please see the references link.
